snippet.title: Stardrop | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
A brand new cutesy, colorful, cosmic collectathon is here! Jump into the whimsical world of Stardrop on August 30th, 2024.

Play as Gumdrop: a strange, little creature whose goal is to collect all the star pieces that fell out of their asteroid after being smashed in orbit. Make your way through a whimsical world on a quest to collect every last drop! Every last... Star... drop... Get it? :DDDD

Stardrop is available FOR FREE on Steam and Itch.io.
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2976700/Stardrop/
Itch.io: https://peachiedotzip.itch.io/stardrop

Developed and published by Gumdrop Studios.
Created by Harrison Weber.
